      • completeMissionForUser

        void completeMissionForUser(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String missionName)
                            throws com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException,
                                   MissionAlreadyCompletedException,
                                   NotValidIdException
        Mark mission as completed for that user and add experience to current user and its ancestors
        Parameters:
        userName - name of current user
        missionName - name of completed mission
        Throws:
        MissionAlreadyCompletedException - throws if user has already completed that mission
        com.deniz.framework.dto.converter.business.impl.valueconverter.exception.DataNotExistException - throws if data with given name does not exist
        NotValidIdException - throws if a critical fail is detected
